entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then flurries beginning overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
